ygData.subject: Re: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, The post was beyond correct. They con red to level 23 s and I was fighting them in a group of 19-23. They flood the South Ro zone line and even with 4-5
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, The post was beyond correct. They con red to level 23's and I was
fighting them in a group of 19-23. They flood the South Ro zone line and
even with 4-5 parties, thier are PLENTY to go around. The only drawback is
that they have no loot. That is why I think Verant will let is slide. They
are like the crocs for levels 19-25 I figure and they help pull some of the
load off the loot zones. Why anyone would complain about them is beyond me.
Its not like they are one hit kills, they do have alot of HP's and a foolish
party can fall to them easily, they do group up when they see their own
being attacked. I think alot of attention hasn't been put towards them
becuase most people near or at 20 run straight to unrest on the other side
of the world. Well, Anyway check it out and grap whatever exp you can, if
the idiots of the game keeo public posting complaints i am sure they will
disapear as quickly as the appeared.

Adol, Lush o' The First Degree, Drun'ken Nation

>Subject: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?

>
>I just saw a post on one of the Stratics boards concerning an over-run of
>Aqua Goblin Pets in Oasis....apparently the wolves are all over the place
>for the last few days and giving very easy EXP.
>Anybody have any info on this to share???
